introduction: Hi, I'm a 22-year-old front-end developer who focuses mainly on VueJS and NuxtJS. I'm also interested in React & Svelte.

skill_card.frontdesc: I can build interfaces with VueJS andTailwindCSS. I master different UI framework such as Ant Design and Buefy. I have some experience with ReactJS!
skill_card.backdesc: I have notions in back-end thanks to the studies I followed. I can build backend applications via Laravel and I also experiment on NestJS.
skill_card.uidesc: I have skills in UI/UX design. I use software such as Lunacy / Figma and I have also in my past used software such as Illustrator and Photoshop.

apitech.desc1: Creation and integration of web pages

axians.desc2: Creation and integration of web pages
axians.desc3: Learning ThreeJS & working with DevOps tools

envn_desc: Creation of a veterinary products store for the school's in-house associations.
envn_desc2: The site enables orders to be placed online, and the cooperative team to prepare orders and keep track of purchase orders.
neptune_desc: Creation of a tool for monitoring dependency and vulnerability linked to an image park. The tool is open source and uses different libraries such as Nuxt and Vue.
